title: Model-View-Controller
content: Model-view-controller is a software design pattern commonly used for developing user interfaces that divides the related program logic into three interconnected elements.

title: Why do we use sequelize?
content: Sequelize lets us connect to a database and perform operations without writing raw SQL queries.

title: How to use DotEnv
content: To use DotEnv, first install it using the command: npm i dotenv. Then in your app, require and configure the package like this: require('dotenv').config().
